title: 2016 In Review stats
body: No matter how much I refresh the page or logout/login again, I always get the same link to sign in to see my stats for the 2016 season. What can I do to remedy this?

replies.body: Are you experiencing this on multiple devices and across different web browsers as well?
I tried Microsoft Edge, Chrome, Safari, and Opera on my phone and the result is the same across all platforms.

Unfortunately, that's as far as we can troubleshoot this. There was a rare bug that caused some loading issues for the page, so I believe this is exactly what happened to you. You can report the issue on our [**Bug Tracker**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) if you'd like. I'm sure our development teams are already looking into fixing this so next year's page loads up with fewer issues.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
I'm having the same issue, also interested in a fix if you find one
